description: Amendments to planning permission dated 31 October 2024 (RN 24/00412/FULL) for: 'Redevelopment of 1-4 Eaton Mews West including demolition behind a part retained facade and replacement building comprising ground and first floor with a new part mansard roof level, to provide six residential (Class C3) units, and provision of office (Class E(g)(i)) accommodation. Creation of rear gardens at ground floor level, installation of plant, and other associated works.' NAMELY, to allow the exclusion of a portion of office 'wing' from the development and a minor reduction in office floorspace; increase in overall GIA due to the reduction in the thickness of the external walls; increased extent of demolition of the part-retained facade; reconfiguration of interiors; alterations to lift overrun; amendements to window and door openings; and, relocation of cycle parking.
